alert.note: Alert for Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Piatt County through 630 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over mainly rural areas of Piatt County, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Bement, Cerro Gordo, White Heath, Cisco, Milmine and Lodge. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 159 and 172. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
